name: lb-lazy-images
description: Lazy load images utility for Parcel-bundler

scripts.build: npx babel index.js --out-file bundle.js && uglifyjs bundle.js -o bundle.js -c -m
scripts.build:v2: rm -rf dist && npx babel src/rawSrc/loadImg.js --out-file bundle.js && uglifyjs bundle.js -o bundle.js -c -m
